meta.title: OKDP - Open Kubernetes Data Platform | 100% Open Source
meta.description: OKDP is a free, open-source, and cloud-native data platform designed for Kubernetes. Built by the community, for the community.
meta.keywords: Open Kubernetes Data Platform, OKDP, Apache Iceberg, Polaris, Trino, Spark, Airflow, Superset, MLOps, Kubernetes, Data Platform

hero.title: Open Kubernetes Data Platform
hero.subtitle: A free, open-source and cloud-native data platform built on Kubernetes. Modular, sovereign, and community-driven.

about.title: What is OKDP?
about.description1: OKDP (Open Kubernetes Data Platform) is a comprehensive data management services platform composed of containerized open source software and products, running on Kubernetes infrastructure.
about.description2: OKDP addresses the complete data lifecycle: collection, storage, processing, analysis, and data exposition. It's modular by design‚Äîdeploy all components or select only what you need.

cards.title: Data Centric
cards.description: Comprehensive platform covering the entire data lifecycle with built-in governance, facilitating data sharing and minimizing duplication.

cards.title: Cloud Native
cards.description: Kubernetes-native platform designed for modern cloud environments with high availability, scalability, and multi-cloud support.

cards.title: True Open Source
cards.description: 100% open source with Apache V2 license. Complete control of the technology lifecycle from build to deployment, with no vendor lock-in.

cards.title: Sovereignty & Cost Control
cards.description: Maintain full autonomy over your data infrastructure while eliminating licensing costs. Free to use, modify, and deploy at any scale.

cards.title: Modular & Future-Proof
cards.description: Flexible architecture adapts to your needs. Built on Kubernetes to prevent technical debt, ensuring sustainability and continuous modernization.

cards.title: Community-Driven
cards.description: Built by the community, for the community. Open collaboration from public and private organizations with a growing ecosystem.

architecture.title: Modular Architecture
architecture.subtitle: OKDP offers a modular architecture that allows you to select and deploy only the components you need for your specific use case.

query.title: Query Engine
query.desc: High-performance SQL query engines for distributed data.

ml.title: ML/AI
ml.desc: Complete MLOps platform for data science workflows.

processing.title: Processing & Orchestration
processing.desc: Data processing engines and workflow orchestration.

storage.title: Storage & Catalog
storage.desc: Modern lakehouse with transactional tables and metadata management.

k8s.title: Built on Kubernetes
k8s.desc: Running on any Kubernetes distribution (RKE, EKS, AKS, GKE) with comprehensive security, observability, and resource management.

architecture.outro: Each component can be deployed independently, allowing you to build a customized data platform that meets your specific needs.

items.title: Technology Builds
items.desc: Continuous building of source code and Docker images for all platform technologies.

items.title: Apache Polaris & Iceberg
items.desc: Integration of Apache Iceberg and Polaris catalog with STS S3 support and RBAC.

items.title: New Frontend & Server
items.desc: Overhaul of the user interface and server for a unified and high-performance experience.

items.title: Apache Airflow
items.desc: Implementation of Apache Airflow for workflow automation and orchestration.

items.title: Initial Data Technologies
items.desc: Successfully integrated core data technologies: JupyterHub, Apache Spark, Trino, Hive Metastore, and Superset.

items.title: Spark & Jupyter Images
items.desc: Provision and support of official base images for Apache Spark and JupyterLab.

items.title: OKDP Server/UI
items.desc: Published the first version of OKDP Server and user interface for platform management.

items.title: Sandbox & Documentation
items.desc: Released comprehensive sandbox environment with user guide and end-to-end test application.

community.title: Join Our Community
community.subtitle: OKDP is built by the community, for the community. Join us in shaping the future of open-source data platforms.

meeting.title: Weekly Technical Meeting
meeting.desc: Every Wednesday at 10:00 AM (CET) - Contact us to receive the meeting details.

contribute.title: Call for Contributions
contribute.desc: Help us build the Open Kubernetes Data Platform. Whether you enjoy infrastructure, data engineering, or docs, there is room for you.

tosit.title: About TOSIT
tosit.desc1: TOSIT is an association that promotes community-driven initiatives to create truly open-source technologies and platforms. It hosts the TDP project, which was initiated by DGFiP and EDF.
tosit.desc2: Since January 2024, DGFiP started the OKDP adventure, which was later joined by Orange. The association brings together numerous companies and administrations including BPCE (Banque Populaire, Caisse d'Epargne et Natixis), Soci√©t√© G√©n√©rale, among others.
tosit.desc3: Participation in TOSIT projects is open to all, with the aim of ensuring that the technology stack is accessible, efficient, and powerful for everyone.
